participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing with a passion for music and art.
participant_1.background: I listen to rap music. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic. My favorite food is pizza. I produce music for artists.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Resilient and reflective, with a love for nature and family.
participant_2.background: I'm a recovering alcoholic. I grew up on a farm. I now live in the city. I'm a 45 year old male. I take many medications and some of them make me see things.
